parameter.name: deviceId
parameter.label: Device ID
parameter.description: HASP Place ID. This is part of the MQTT topic, e.g. "hasp/#plateid#".

parameter.name: configMode
parameter.label: Config Mode
parameter.description: The device can either be configured manually entering pages and doing the manual mapping or by copying the content of one or more sitemap, in which case the items will be automatically distributed.

parameter.name: sitemap
parameter.description: The sitemap to copy the items from, it can be a sitemap list separated by comas.

parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Hostname
parameter.description: Hostname or IP address of the device

parameter.name: backlightHigh
parameter.label: Backlight high intensity
parameter.description: Brightness when the device is being used.

parameter.name: backlightMedium
parameter.label: Backlight medium intensity
parameter.description: Brightness when the device is idle for a short period of time.

parameter.name: backlightLow
parameter.label: Backlight low intensity
parameter.description: Brightness when the device is idle for a long period of time.

channel-type.label: Backlight
channel-type.description: Backlight changes the brightness of the backlight.

parameter.name: buttonId
parameter.label: Button Id
parameter.description: Button Id from OpenHAS ie. p0b1
